title: Advanced Simulation-Based Nursing Practice Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing skills, clinical practice experience, and foundational human physiology knowledge
context.additional_context: Conducted in a specialized simulation lab equipped with digital devices. Team-based collaboration and role-play-centered educational environment

learning_goals: Learners can apply critical thinking to make decisions in complex clinical scenarios using an advanced human patient simulator (HPS).
Learners can improve their analytical skills and confidence in responding to patient condition changes by over 20% through simulation-based experiential learning.
Learners can execute and evaluate effective communication and teamwork strategies in a culturally sensitive simulation environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
